Name: Gamedev simulator
About the game: Feel like a game developer! Start alone and take small steps, grow out of a small indie studio, a big company! In the game you will have a curator who will find orders for you and say what kind of games customers want, you need to adhere to the wishes of the customer, and not make mistakes when developing the game, otherwise you will lose your reputation and have to start again. Also, you have to pay for the rental of the premises, once a day, respectively, the steeper your office, the higher the rent. Make the right decisions and filter out the wrong ones. The gameplay seems simple at first glance, but itâ€™s not quite so, 'gamedev simulator' is a kind of brain simulator that develops memory, reaction and attentiveness, so the game is not only exciting but also useful! Features: Colorful graphics. Isometric view.
